assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Townend is a reserve member of the European Commission, DG Justice and Consumers “Multistakeholder expert group to support the application of Regulation (EU) 2016/679”, and a member of the BBMRI-ERIC drafting GDPR Article 40 code of conduct working party. This paper is written in a purely private capacity, and the views expressed here cannot be attributed to anyone other than the author.
